Headline: Temporary  #92 Foster Reroute at Kimball/Foster
ShortDescription: 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted near Kimball/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Foster, Pulaski, Bryn Mawr, Kedzie, Foster, and resume normal route due to street blockage near Kimball/Foster.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #82 Kimball/Homan Reroute near Kimball/Foster
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball/Homan buses temp. rerouted near Kimball/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball/Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Kimball/Foster.

Northbound buses will operate via Kimball, Lawrence, Kedzie, Bryn Mawr, Kimball, and resume normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Kimball, Bryn Mawr, Kedzie, Lawrence, Kimball, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound #93 California/Dodge Reroute near Kimball/Foster
ShortDescription: Southbound 93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted near Kimball/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Kedzie, Montrose, Kimball, Lawrence, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Kimball/Foster.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Eastbound #72 North Ave Reroute near North Avenue Beach
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North Ave buses are temporarily rerouted near North Avenue Beach.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
At the request of Police, due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, Eastbound #72 North Ave buses will only provide service up to North Avenue and Clark

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
